EmailTemplate.description: When a new case is created inside of Business hours that is not an internal case type and is not From a Xometry sender and is received at work@xometry.com and does not contain #jobaccepted} in the email, an auto reply email should be sent.
EmailTemplate.name: Work@xometry.com Auto Reply
